attributes.action: Ban driving licences from countries where the driving test isn't equal to ours.
attributes.additional_details: Motorists see this daily with commercial and none commercial vehicles.
attributes.background: The standard of driving from some countries is simply not good enough for their people to drive on our roads without endangering other motorists.

rejection.details: We're not sure what you mean by "not equal" to the British driving test. We can only accept petitions which call for clear, specific action by the Government or Parliament.
